item.title: China Will Be A Core Strength for Applied Materials, Says Muse
item.description: CJ Muse, Cantor Fitzgerald Semiconductor and Semiconductor Equipment Equity Research Analyst, joins Open Interest to discuss expectations for Applied Materials, Sandisk, and other chips-related stocks
